fullText: Rob McClure gives a performance of remarkable physical and vocal dexterity as the Little Tramp, capturing both Chaplin's comic genius and his darker personal struggles.
dtliExcerpt: Rob McClure gives a performance of remarkable physical and vocal dexterity as the Little Tramp, capturing both Chaplin's comic genius and his darker personal struggles.
